description: A large plaza in Fish-Man Island where major battles occur during the conflict with the New Fish-Man Pirates. The location serves as the main battleground for the Straw Hat Pirates versus the New Fish-Man Pirates officers.

keyEvents.title: Hody Defeats Vander Decken IX
keyEvents.description: Hody Jones decisively defeats Vander Decken IX at the plaza, pulling his trident out and claiming it as his weapon.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Hody as the sole primary antagonist.

keyEvents.title: Wadatsumi vs Surume
keyEvents.description: The Energy Steroid-enhanced Wadatsumi overpowers and defeats Surume at the plaza.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the power of Energy Steroids.

keyEvents.title: Jinbe's 7000 Brick Roundhouse Kick
keyEvents.description: Jinbe blocks Wadatsumi's attack at the plaza using his Fish-Man Karate technique.

keyEvents.title: Nuru's Challenge
keyEvents.description: Nuru appears at the plaza and challenges Zoro, seeking to become the strongest swordsman of Fish-Man Island.

keyEvents.title: Hyouzou's Transformation
keyEvents.description: Hyouzou consumes excessive Energy Steroids at the plaza and undergoes a dramatic transformation.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the dangerous effects of Energy Steroid overdose.

keyEvents.title: Hyouzou Kills Nuru
keyEvents.description: The transformed Hyouzou indiscriminately kills Nuru at the plaza during his rampage.

keyEvents.title: Zoro vs Hyouzou Begins
keyEvents.description: Zoro intercepts Hyouzou's attack on Robin at the plaza and volunteers to fight him.

statusHistory.reason: Main battleground during Fish-Man Island arc

description: The underwater region surrounding Fish-Man Island, 10,000 meters below sea level. This area is where fish-men and merfolk have superior mobility and strength compared to surface dwellers.

keyEvents.title: Hody Pursues Shirahoshi
keyEvents.description: Hody Jones uses his overwhelming underwater speed to pursue Shirahoshi through the waters, cutting through Ryuboshi and Manboshi and grabbing her by the hair.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Hody's superior underwater abilities and poses immediate threat to Shirahoshi.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Underwater Combat
keyEvents.description: Luffy uses Gomu Gomu no Snake Shot underwater to attack Hody and rescue Shirahoshi, proving he can fight effectively in the water after his training.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Luffy's post-timeskip improvement in overcoming his environmental weakness.
